citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The most recent semiannual facility inspection conducted by the IACUC was on June 3, 2024, a period greater than 6
months from the previous inspection on October 30, 2023. Failure to conduct semiannual inspections of the animal
facilities at least once every six months may hinder the ability of institutional officials to identify problems and take needed
corrective actions to prevent animal facilities and animal study areas from falling into disrepair and non-compliance.
The IACUC, as an agent of the research facility, shall inspect, at least once every six months, all of the research facility's
animal facilities, including animal study areas, using title 9, chapter I, subchapter A-Animal Welfare, as a basis for
evaluation.
Correct by December 3, 2024, and forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(2) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The most recent semiannual facility inspection conducted by the IACUC was on June 3, 2024, a period greater than 6 
months from the previous inspection on October 30, 2023. Failure to conduct semiannual inspections of the animal 
facilities at least once every six months may hinder the ability of institutional officials to identify problems and take needed 
corrective actions to prevent animal facilities and animal study areas from falling into disrepair and non-compliance.  
 
The IACUC, as an agent of the research facility, shall inspect, at least once every six months, all of the research facility's 
animal facilities, including animal study areas, using title 9, chapter I, subchapter A-Animal Welfare, as a basis for 
evaluation. 
 
Correct by December 3, 2024, and forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
